answerText: glycolysis [10] A member of this family of enzymes phosphorylates glucose in the first step of glycolysis. The specific glycolysis enzyme is frequently referred to by this general name as well.

subject: Science
question: Question: This pathway produces a net two NADH molecules and two ATP molecules from the breakdown of a single glucose into a pair of pyruvates. For 10 points each: [10] Name this first pathway of both aerobic and anaerobic respiration.
